resources.string: Unable to get current weather
The application not determine the current weather for your location. Check your internet connection.
Too cloudy
It\'s too cloudy to see any aurora right now. Aurora sightings require clear skies.
Probably too cloudy
It\'s probably too cloudy to see any aurora right now. Aurora sightings require clear skies.
Unable to get location
Could not determine your location. Make sure your device has location turned on.
Too bright
It\'s too bright outside to see any aurora. Aurora sightings require sufficient darkness outside.
Probably too bright
It\'s probably too bright outside to see any aurora. Aurora sightings require sufficient darkness outside.
Unable to get solar activity
The application could not determine the current solar activity. Check your internet connection.
Weak solar activity
The solar activity is not strong enough to see any aurora right now. Try again later.
Bad location
You are too far away from any magnetic pole to see any aurora.
No data
The app does not have enough data to evaluate the current aurora chance. Try refreshing.
